content.rendered:
The Route 10 Raid Den is found by interacting with the gap between two trees west of the waterfall with the stones that you’re able to jump on.

Location

Raid Pokémon

Pokémon Star Level
Lombre 2-Star and 3-Star
Ludicolo 4-Star and 5-Star
Palpitoad 2-Star and 3-Star
Seismitoad 4-Star and 5-Star
Ditto 2-Star, 3-Star, 4-Star, and 5-Star

Goomy 2-Star and 3-Star
Sliggoo 4-Star
Goodra 5-Star
Shelmet 2-Star and 3-Star
Accelgor 4-Star and 5-Star
Cramorant 2-Star, 3-Star, 4-Star, and 5-Star
Linoone (Galar) 2-Star
Obstagoon 3-Star, 4-Star, and 5-Star
